price: Mennhwehwε akͻnhoma biara wͻ wͻn hͻ, na mennhwehwε nso sε wͻ’ma Me biribi nni.
arabic: مَآ أُرِيدُ مِنۡهُم مِّن رِّزۡقٖ وَمَآ أُرِيدُ أَن يُطۡعِمُونِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā urīdu min'hum min riz'qin wamā urīdu an yuṭ'ʿimūni
